member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MIME.text.markdown.MarkdownRender.Transform(System.String)
member.summary: transform markdown document text to another document format

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MIME.text.markdown.MarkdownRender.hideImage
member.summary: due to the reason of some image file name pattern may be mis-interpretered as the markdown syntax, this will case the in-correct url, example as: ``/images/file_name_data.png`` may be interpreted as ``/images/filenamedata.png``. so we needs hide the image span at first.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MIME.text.markdown.MarkdownRender.RunAutoLink
member.remarks: for avoid some un-expected markdown format bug, example as /?q=__a__ maybe transform as /?q=a

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MIME.text.markdown.TextRender
member.remarks: not only the markdown format tag will be removed from this render, and also the additional html tag inside the given markdown document will be removed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MIME.text.markdown.TextRender.Document(System.String)
member.summary: additional html tag inside the document will be removed

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MIME.text.markdown.TOC.GetHeaders(System.String)
member.summary: 按header在markdown文档之中出现的顺序进行返回
